goal: Implement death saving throws - specialized saving throw mechanic for characters at 0 HP with unique roll interpretation, success/failure tracking, and damage handling

sessions.summary: Implemented complete death saving throws mechanics following TDD approach
completed: Created DeathSaveState struct with Successes, Failures, Stabilized, Dead fields
Created DeathSaveInput struct with Roller and State
Created DeathSaveResult struct with Roll, State, IsCriticalFail, IsCriticalSuccess, RegainedConsciousness, HPRestored
Created DamageWhileUnconsciousInput struct with State and IsCritical
Created DamageWhileUnconsciousResult struct with State and FailuresAdded
Implemented MakeDeathSave() with D&D 5e roll interpretation (1=2 failures, 2-9=1 failure, 10-19=1 success, 20=regain consciousness)
Implemented TakeDamageWhileUnconscious() (1 failure for normal, 2 for crit)
Wrote 19 comprehensive tests covering all roll outcomes and edge cases
All tests passing (19/19 death save tests + 12 existing saving throw tests)
Fixed linter issues (unused parameter, line length)

next_steps: Consider integration with character state management
Consider event system integration for death save results
